title: Viet Nam News  - The road to victory - 19/5/2019
content: Viet Nam News  - The road to victory - 19/5/2019 Đang cập nhật Viet Nam News  - The road to victory - 19/5/2019 The Hồ Chí Minh Trail proved a vital lifeline on the country's path  to reunification, but keeping it open came at a high price.
